Scriptal.Name: Fade In From Black
Scriptal.Description: The screen fades back in, as though a cutscene or a loading screen ended.

Choice.Name: Sender
Choice.Description: When the fade in is completed, a "EndFadeIn" message is sent. This value will be the name of the sender.

Choice.Name: Fade-In Time (Seconds)
Choice.Description: The amount of time in seconds before the screen is completely faded back in.
